p: Results: There have been 57 ECLS runs in 53 patients and 33 patients who received peripheral VA ECMO – all of these cases were moribund by conventional intensive care standards, and included 17 true eCPR cases. Overall, 21 weaned (64 %) and 17 survived (52 %) – 3 who were weaned but died, were refused transfer for destination VAD/transplant assessment.
